description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Dashboard' that manages and displays a list of Jira projects. It includes state management for projects, filtering, loading/error handling, and UI controls for view modes, search, and filtering. It also handles fetching data from an external Jira API service and rendering project cards and modals.

methods.name: Dashboard
methods.description: React functional component that renders the Jira projects dashboard with filtering, view toggles, and project details modal.
